author: George Orwell
summary: A novel depicting a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

author: Harper Lee
title: To Kill a Mockingbird
summary: A story about racial injustice in the Deep South.

author: J.K. Rowling
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
summary: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
title: The Great Gatsby
summary: A critique of the American Dream set in the 1920s.

author: Mary Shelley
title: Frankenstein
summary: A scientist creates a sentient creature in an unorthodox experiment.
